Model.Enemies.Enemy

  • Packages that use Enemy 
    Package Description
    Controller  

    • Uses of Enemy in Controller

      Methods in Controller that return types with arguments of type Enemy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<Enemy> Map.getEnemy() 
      java.util.ArrayList<Enemy> SpawnGameObjects.spawnEnemies()
      Spawns the enemies depending on the level requirements
      Methods in Controller with parameters of type Enemy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Map.changeDirectionAtIntersection(Enemy enemy)
      if intelligence is 2 or 3 and also at the intersection it can change direction with probability of 0.1(intelligence=2) or 0.5(intelligence=3)
      void Map.changeDirectionToChaseBomberman(Enemy enemy, int bombermanDirection, int enemyDirection)
      if the bomberman is at the opposite direction of the enemy movement then change the movement state to opposite
      int Map.chaseDirection(Enemy enemy, int tileBombman, int tileEnemy)
      returns the correct direction to chase the Bomberman
      void Map.findPathToBomberman(Enemy enemy, int tileBombman, int tileEnemy)
      Finds the correct path to bomberman when obstacles exist(for intelligence = 3 only)
      boolean Map.isChaseBombermanPathFree(Enemy enemy, int tileBombman, int tileEnemy)
      returns boolean whether the chase bomberman path is free(for intelligence = 3 only)
      void SpawnGameObjects.isStuck(Enemy enemy, int xVal, int yVal)
      check if the enemy will get stuck in the concrete when they are spwaned, if it is then change the moving direction
      void Map.moveEnemy(Enemy enemy)
      move the enemy to current moving direction or change the moving direction to opposite if path is not free
      void Map.moveEnemyWhenBombermanWithInRange(Enemy enemy, int bombermanDirection)
      move the enemy when bomberman is within range.
